expo.name: harbor
expo.description: Harbor is a unique dating app for Cornell students that focuses on meaningful connections through progressive photo reveal and limited daily interactions. Connect with fellow Cornell students in a safe, respectful environment.

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Harbor needs access to your camera to take profile photos.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Harbor needs access to your photo library to select profile photos.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Harbor needs access to your microphone for voice messages in chat.
infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This app does not track users across other companies' apps or websites.

plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you share them with your friends.

plugins.microphonePermission: Harbor would like to use your microphone for voice recording.
